Line5.7FA05: The first Horadrim used a set of soulstones to contain Diablo, Mephisto, and Baal. But such power comes at a cost.
VoiceDir1.7FA05: Bitter, but also must acknowledge that the soulstone is the Horadrim's most powerful weapon
Line1.7FA05: It is a curse. The bane of the Horadrim...but also our greatest weapon. There’s nothing like it in existence.
